Class ProjectResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ligoj.app.resource.project.ProjectResource

 @Service
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public class ProjectResource
extends java.lang.Object
    Project resource.

      • findAll

        @GET
public org.ligoj.bootstrap.core.json.TableItem<ProjectLightVo> findAll(@Context
                                                                            javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo,
                                                                            @QueryParam(value="search[value]")
                                                                            java.lang.String criteria)
        Retrieve all project with pagination, and filtered. A visible project is attached to a visible group.
        Parameters:
        uriInfo - pagination data.
        criteria - the optional criteria to match.
        Returns:
        all elements with pagination.

      • findByPKey

 @Path(value="{pkey:^([a-z]|[0-9]+-?[a-z])[a-z0-9\\-]*$}")
public ProjectLightVo findByPKey(@PathParam(value="pkey")
                                                                                                 java.lang.String pkey)
        Return a project with all subscription parameters and their status. The security is checked regarding the current user.
        Parameters:
        pkey - Project pkey.
        Returns:
        Found element. May not be null.
